name: smart-mirror
description: Smart Mirror with AI Integration - Full Stack Application

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client-mirror && npm run electron-dev"
scripts.prod: npm run build && concurrently "cd server && NODE_ENV=production npm start" "cd client-mirror && npx electron ."
scripts.prod:pi: npm run install:all && npm run build && concurrently "cd server && NODE_ENV=production npm start" "cd client-mirror && npx electron ."
scripts.prod:debug: echo 'Building...' && npm run build && echo 'Starting server...' && cd server && npm start & echo 'Starting electron...' && cd ../client-mirror && npx electron .
scripts.test:build: npm run build && echo 'Build completed successfully!' && ls -la client-mirror/dist/
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd .. && cd client-mirror && npm install
